text: Ne olwa baboolola emisiko chiabu , nibanyoolamwo emiandu chiabu chikalusibwe, ni baboola mbu: â€œewe papa wefu shina shindi shiakhwenya? chino ni emiandu chiefu chikalusibwe khwifwe! khurere eshakhulia khulwa Abandu befu, ne khwitsa okhulinda omusiani wefu, ne khulanyoola eshibaba shie ingamia ndala, esho neshichelo eshititi. (khubuhani bwomwami)
